hero.title: The Perfect Platform for Language Teachers
hero.description: Manage your students, track progress, and organize your teaching schedule all in one elegant, intuitive platform.

features.title: Everything You Need to Succeed
features.description: Our platform is designed specifically for language teachers, with all the tools you need to manage your teaching business.

studentManagement.title: Student Management
studentManagement.description: Keep track of all your students, their language levels, progress, and contact information in one place.

scheduling.title: Scheduling & Calendar
scheduling.description: Organize your teaching schedule, set reminders, and manage bookings with an intuitive calendar interface.

progress.title: Progress Tracking
progress.description: Monitor student progress and performance with detailed analytics and customizable reports.

cta.title: Ready to transform your teaching experience?
cta.description: Join thousands of language teachers who are simplifying their workflow and focusing on what matters most: teaching.

footer.slogan: The ultimate platform for language teachers

auth.signInAccess: Sign in to access your teaching portal
